title: Moonbug, maker of hit kids' show â€˜CoCoMelon,' may sell or go public
text:
The company has received interest from multiple suitors and is seeking a valuation of more than $3 billion, some of the people said. One suitor is a company backed by private-equity giant Blackstone Inc. BX run by former Walt Disney Co. DIS executives Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs, the people said.

There is no guarantee that the conversations with potential acquirers will result in a deal, the people said. Moonbug is also weighing an initial public offering, which executives believe would result in a valuation significantly higher than $3 billion, some of the people said.

An expanded version of this report appears on WSJ.com.

Zillow gets outplayed at its own game.
